bropals.lib.simplegame.util

Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.util.Counter

  • public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for a simple counter. This Counter calls its CounterFunction whenever it completes its count cycle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Counter(int targetNumber, boolean looping, CounterFunction function)
      Creates a counter with the specified target number and loop preference.
      Counter(int targetNumber, CounterFunction function)
      Creates a counter with the specified target number.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CounterFunction getFunction()
      Gets the function that is called when the counter completes its counting.
      int getTargetNumber()
      Gets the number of update() calls it takes to complete a counter cycle.
      boolean isLooping()
      Sees if this Counter loops.
      void reset()
      Resets this Counter's counting.
      void setFunction(CounterFunction function)
      Sets the function that is called when the counter completes its counting.
      void setLooping(boolean looping)
      Sets the loop preference of this counter.
      void setTargetNumber(int targetNumber)
      Sets the number of update() calls it takes to complete a counter cycle.
      void update()
      Updates this counter, having it call its function if it completes its counting.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Counter

        public Counter(int targetNumber,
       CounterFunction function)
        Creates a counter with the specified target number. Does not loop.
        Parameters:
        targetNumber - the number of update() calls between each function call.
        function - the function to call whenever the Counter is done counting.

      • Counter

        public Counter(int targetNumber,
       boolean looping,
       CounterFunction function)
        Creates a counter with the specified target number and loop preference.
        Parameters:
        targetNumber - the number of update() calls between each function call.
        looping - sets the loop preference of this Counter.
        function - the function to call whenever the Counter is done counting.
